Ability.Name: Mangle
Ability.Lua:
local debuff = UnitDebuffID("Target", 33878) local buff = UnitBuffID("Player", 93622) local buff2 = UnitBuffID("Player", 50334)
if buff ~= nil and catMode == false then return true else end
if buff2 ~= nil and catMode == false then return true else end
if debuff == nil and catMode == false then return true end
local MangleCD = GetSpellCooldown(33878)
if MangleCD == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Demoralizing Roar
Ability.Lua:
local vind = UnitDebuffID("target", 26016) local vindication = UnitDebuffID("target", 26017) local demoshout = UnitDebuffID("target", 1160) local curseofweakness = UnitDebuffID("target", 702) local demoroar = UnitDebuffID("target", 99) local scarfev = UnitDebuffID("target", 81130) local demoscree = UnitDebuffID("target", 24423) local demopetbear = UnitDebuffID("target", 50256)
if CheckInteractDistance("target", 2) == nil or UnitCanAttack("player", "target") == nil and catMode == false then return false end
if vind == nil and vindication == nil and demoshout == nil and curseofweakness == nil and demoroar == nil and scarfev == nil and demoscree == nil and demopetbear == nil and catMode == false then local targetName = UnitName("target") if targetName ~= nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: Lacerate
Ability.Lua:
local lacerate = UnitDebuffID("Target", 33745) local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758)
if setAoE and catMode == false then if ThrashCD ~= 0 then if lacerate == nil then return true end end else end
if setAoE == false and catMode == false then if lacerate == nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: Thrash
Ability.Lua:
local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758)
if catMode == false then if setAoE == false then if ThrashCD == 0 then return true end else end end

Ability.Name: Lacerate - 3 Stack
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, count = UnitDebuffID("target", 33745) local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758)
if setAoE and catMode == false then if ThrashCD ~= nil then if count >= 1 then if count < 3 then return true end end end else end
if setAoE == false and catMode == false then if count > 1 then if count < 3 then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Pulverize
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, count = UnitDebuffID("Target", 33745) local pulbuff, _, _, _, _, _, pultimer = UnitBuffID("Player", 80951) local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758)
if setAoE == false and catMode == false then if pulbuff ~= nil then if count == 3 then if pultimer - GetTime() < 4 then return true end end else if count == 3 and pulbuff == nil then return true end end else if setAoE and catMode == false then if ThrashCD ~= 0 then if pulbuff ~= nil then if count == 3 then if pultimer - GetTime() < 4 then return true end end else if count == 3 and pulbuff == nil then return true end end end end end

Ability.Name: Faerie Fire
Ability.Lua:
local firedebuff, _, _, _, _, _, firetimer = UnitDebuffID("Target", 91565)
if firedebuff == nil and catMode == false then return true end
if firedebuff ~= nil and catMode == false then if firetimer - GetTime() < 3 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Lacerate Filler
Ability.Lua:
local lacerate = UnitDebuffID("Target", 33745)
if setAoE == false and catMode == false then if lacerate ~= nil then return true end else end

Ability.Name: Maul
Ability.Lua:
local MaulCD = GetSpellCooldown(6807) local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758) local Rage = UnitPower("Player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if setAoE and catMode == false then if MaulCD == 0 and ThrashCD ~= 0 and Rage > 30 then return true end else end
if setAoE == false and catMode == false then if MaulCD == 0 and Rage > 50 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Enrage
Ability.Lua:
local EnrageCD = GetSpellCooldown(5229) local Rage = UnitPower("Player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if catMode == false then if EnrageCD ~= 0 then return false else if EnrageCD == 0 then if Rage < 80 then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: -- Special Events --
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion. local altDown = IsAltKeyDown() local sDivineShield = UnitBuffID("player", 642)
if altDown == nil then local spellHourOfTwilight = GetSpellInfo(109417) local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell ~= nil and channelSpell == spellHourOfTwilight then local finishTime = endTime/1000 - GetTime() if finishTime < 1 and sDivineShield == nil then return true end end end
local sFadingLight, _, _, _, _, _, fadingEndTime = UnitDebuffID("player", 110068) if sFadingLight then local finishTime = fadingEndTime - GetTime() if finishTime < 1.4 then return true end end
-- Try to aim on Darkmoon Faerie Cannon local canontime = select(7,UnitBuffID("player",102116)) if canontime and canontime - GetTime() < 1.15 then CancelUnitBuff("player","Magic Wings") end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Crystal Prison", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 0.3 then rightkeydown = GetTime() if setAoE then setAoE = false print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ASingle target") else setAoE = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652AArea of Effect") end end
if IsRightAltKeyDown() then if IsRightAltKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1.5 then rightkeydown = GetTime() if catMode then catMode = false print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ABear Mode") CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5487))) else catMode = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652ACat Mode") CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(768))) end end end
if UnitIsDead("target") or immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end

Ability.Name: Mark of the Wild
Ability.Lua:
local motwbuff = UnitBuffID("Player", 79061)
if motwbuff == nil and noaggromobs == nil then return true else end

Ability.Name: Swipe
Ability.Lua:
local Rage = UnitPower("Player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local SwipeCD = GetSpellCooldown(779)
if setAoE and catMode == false then if SwipeCD == 0 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Thrash - AoE
Ability.Lua:
local ThrashCD = GetSpellCooldown(77758)
if setAoE and catMode == false then if ThrashCD == 0 then return true end else end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua:
if catMode == false then local pultimer = select(7, UnitBuffID("Player", 33745)) local pulverize = UnitBuffID("Player", 80951) local BerserkCD = GetSpellCooldown(50334)
if pulverize == true and BerserkCD == 0 then if pultimer - GetTime() > 14 then return true else return false end end else end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Ferocious Bite
Ability.Lua:
local fbrip, _, _, _, _, _, fbtimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local fbCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local fbhealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local fbenergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if fbhealth <=60 and catMode then if fbrip ~= nil then if fbCP == 5 then return true end end else if fbrip ~= nil and catMode then if fbtimer - GetTime() > 7 and fbenergy >= 60 and fbCP == 5 then return true end end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Mangle
Ability.Lua:
-- Rogues and Warriors can handle it themselves. local hasCatMangle, _, _, _, _, _, CatMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle, _, _, _, _, _, BearMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878, "PLAYER") local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511) local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if PQR_NotBehindTarget() and catMode then if CP == 5 then return false else return true end end
-- First, let's let other people handle their own debuffs if hasTrauma ~= nil then return false elseif hasHemorrhage ~= nil then return false elseif hasBearMangle ~= nil then return false
-- Let us handle it! elseif hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil and catMode then -- Check the timer if CatMangleTimer - GetTime() < 5 then return true end else end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Rake
Ability.Lua:
local rake, _, _, _, _, _, raketimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1822, "PLAYER")
if rake ~= nil and catMode then if raketimer - GetTime() < 4 then return true end else if catMode then return true end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Rip
Ability.Lua:
local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local ripCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local riphealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if rip ~= nil and catMode then if riphealth > 60 then if ripCP == 5 then if riptimer - GetTime() < 4 then return true end end end else if ripCP == 5 and catMode then return true end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Savage Roar
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,SavageRoar = UnitBuffID("player", 62071) local srCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER")
if SavageRoar ~= nil and catMode then return false else if rip ~= nil and catMode then if srCP >= 5 and catMode then if riptimer - GetTime() >= 8 then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Shred
Ability.Lua:
-- Check for the debuffs. local hasCatMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878) local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511) local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
-- Just check for all buffs, we have no casting time on Shred so no need for a timer check if hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil or hasTrauma ~= nil or hasHemorrhage ~= nil and catMode then if PQR_NotBehindTarget() and catMode then return false else if CP == 5 and catMode then return false else return true end end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Swipe
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,BS = UnitBuffID("player", 50334) local energy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if setAoE and catMode BS ~= nil then if energy >= 22 then return true end else if setAoE and catMode energy >= 45 then return true end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Tigers Fury
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,TF = UnitBuffID("player", 5217) local TFstart, TFduration = GetSpellCooldown(5217) local TFcooldown = (TFstart + TFduration - GetTime()) local tfEnergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede")
if TF ~= nil and catMode then return false else if TFcooldown > 0 and catMode then return false else if stamp ~= nil and catMode then return false else if tfEnergy < 45 and catMode then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: ZCats - Ravage!
Ability.Lua:
local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede")
if stamp ~= nil and catMode then RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 0") RunMacroText("/cast Ravage!") RunMacroText("/console Sound_EnableSFX 1") end
